多功能牙刷：Design a toothbrush that can be used for various oral care tasks, such as cleaning between teeth, massaging gums, and even whitening teeth.
无线充电牙刷：Develop a toothbrush that can be charged wirelessly, eliminating the need for cords and making it more convenient to use.
自适应刷头：Create a toothbrush with an adaptive head that can adjust its bristles to suit different oral conditions, such as sensitive teeth or gums.
智能牙刷套装：Design a toothbrush that comes with a smart case that can track oral health, provide reminders for regular brushing, and even dispense toothpaste.
环境友好牙刷：Develop a toothbrush made from eco-friendly materials, biodegradable, and recyclable, reducing waste and promoting sustainability.
